entities.description: A category that signifies the level of risk associated with substance use.
Type of drug or substance being assessed for risk or availability.
Ease of obtaining a particular substance.
The recorded response of an individual to a specific survey question.

relationships.description: Relates a survey response to a particular risk category for substance use.
Indicates the specific substance that the survey response is related to.
Relates a survey response to the perceived availability of the substance.
